mapper.insert: insert into schedule (user_id, schedule_title, schedule_company, schedule_date, schedule_memo, schedule_category, schedule_status) values (#{userId}, #{scheduleTitle}, #{scheduleCompany}, now(), #{scheduleMemo}, #{scheduleCategory}, #{scheduleStatus})
mapper.select: select schedule_id scheduleId, user_id userId, schedule_title scheduleTitle, schedule_company scheduleCompany, schedule_date scheduleDate, schedule_memo scheduleMemo, schedule_category scheduleCategory, schedule_status scheduleStatus from schedule where schedule_id = #{scheduleId}

select schedule_id scheduleId, user_id userId, schedule_title scheduleTitle, schedule_company scheduleCompany, schedule_date scheduleDate, schedule_memo scheduleMemo, schedule_category scheduleCategory, schedule_status scheduleStatus from schedule where user_id = #{userId} and schedule_date between date_format(#{scheduleDate}, '%Y-%m-01') and date_format(last_day(#{scheduleDate}), '%Y-%m-%d')

select schedule_id scheduleId, user_id userId, schedule_title scheduleTitle, schedule_company scheduleCompany, schedule_date scheduleDate, schedule_memo scheduleMemo, schedule_category scheduleCategory, schedule_status scheduleStatus from schedule where user_id = #{userId} and schedule_title like concat('%',#{scheduleTitle},'%')

select schedule_id scheduleId, user_id userId, schedule_title scheduleTitle, schedule_company scheduleCompany, schedule_date scheduleDate, schedule_memo scheduleMemo, schedule_category scheduleCategory, schedule_status scheduleStatus from schedule where user_id = #{userId} and schedule_company like concat('%',#{scheduleCompany},'%')

select schedule_id scheduleId, user_id userId, schedule_title scheduleTitle, schedule_company scheduleCompany, schedule_date scheduleDate, schedule_memo scheduleMemo, schedule_category scheduleCategory, schedule_status scheduleStatus from schedule where user_id = #{userId} and schedule_memo like concat('%',#{scheduleMemo},'%')
